column4: Order entry system: user enters product code, Excel automatically fills in product price from master price list. VLOOKUP searches product code in table, returns price from corresponding row. Eliminates manual price entry errors.

column4: VLOOKUP limitation: cannot look left. INDEX-MATCH combination overcomes this. INDEX returns value at position, MATCH finds position. More powerful and flexible than VLOOKUP.
